headline: Roth Capital Downgrades EOG Resources (EOG) to Neutral From Buy, Lowers PT to $134
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) is one of the 10 Cheap Large Cap Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 9, Roth Capital analyst Leo Mariani downgraded EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) to Neutral from Buy, lowering the price target to $134 from $140. The firm supported this downward revision in rating to global oil prices, […]

headline: How ConocoPhillips' Low-Cost Inventory Drives Competitive Advantage
summary: COP's ultra-low-cost oil assets give it a major edge, even if crude drops to $40, its profits remain intact.
